name: Blackfesk
description:
Take control over the giant sea-creature, the BLACKFESK, and wreck ships, planes, dinosaurs, sharks, mechs and vikings!

Xbox Controller:
Left Thumbstick: Left Tentacle
Right Thumbstick: Right Tentacle
Left Trigger: Rotate Left
Right Trigger: Rotate Right
Left Trigger + Right Trigger: HYPE!!!
Left Trigger + Right Trigger (In Air): Double Jump

Keyboard:
Arrow keys: Move tentacles
A: Rotate left
D: Rotate right
A + D: HYPE!!!
A + D (In Air): Double Jump

Now... Wreck some SHIPS!

Ludum Dare entry

Soundtrack
